A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A lot of people have a lot of valid problems with the film\, and yes\, it does wobble a bit in some places. However\, it's a film that sees you can't please everyone\, so it goes in a direction Star Wars hasn't before\, going a little darker with welcome boosts in tone at points. As all Star Wars films\, it has flaws\, but it's a damn good film throughout\, better on second viewing.
